text.0_Verse, 0_Verset: Come, my lover, to welcome the bride
text.0_Verse, 1_Verset: The face of Shabbat we will receive
text.1_Verse, 1_Verset: We were caused to listen by the Unified God
text.1_Verse, 2_Verset: Adonai is One, and His Name is One
text.1_Verse, 3_Verset: To His name, and to glory and to praise!
text.2_Verse, 0_Verset: To greet the Sabbath, come and we'll go
text.2_Verse, 1_Verset: For she is a source of blessing
text.2_Verse, 2_Verset: From the first, from of old, she was chosen
text.2_Verse, 3_Verset: Made at the end, and planned from the start
text.3_Verse, 0_Verset: O Holy Place of the King, city of sovereignty
text.3_Verse, 1_Verset: Arise, escape from the midst of the chaos
text.3_Verse, 2_Verset: Long have you sat in the valley of tears
text.3_Verse, 3_Verset: And He will grant mercy, mercy upon you
text.4_Verse, 0_Verset: Shake it off, from the ashes get up!
text.4_Verse, 1_Verset: Put on the clothes of your glory, my people!
text.4_Verse, 2_Verset: By the hand of the son of Jesse the Bethlehemite
text.4_Verse, 3_Verset: Nearer to my soul is its redemption!
text.5_Verse, 1_Verset: For your light has come! Get up, my light!
text.5_Verse, 2_Verset: Wake up! Wake up! A song, speak out!
text.5_Verse, 3_Verset: The glory of Adonai upon you is revealed!
text.6_Verse, 0_Verset: Don't be ashamed! Don't be abashed!
text.6_Verse, 1_Verset: Why be depressed? Why be upset?
text.6_Verse, 2_Verset: In you my poor people will be sheltered
text.6_Verse, 3_Verset: And she shall be rebuilt - the city on her hill!
text.7_Verse, 0_Verset: And attacked shall be those who attack you
text.7_Verse, 1_Verset: And far distant will be those who devoured you.
text.7_Verse, 2_Verset: For you your God will rejoice
text.7_Verse, 3_Verset: As a groom rejoices for his bride
text.8_Verse, 0_Verset: Right and left you will break out
text.8_Verse, 2_Verset: By the hand of the man of the line of Peretz
text.8_Verse, 3_Verset: We will rejoice and we will sing
text.9_Verse, 0_Verset: Come in peace, crown of her husband
text.9_Verse, 1_Verset: As well in joy and in jubilation
text.9_Verse, 2_Verset: The midst of the faithful precious nation
